alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 3:21AM CDT until July 12 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Holt County in north central Nebraska... Boyd County in north central Nebraska... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 321 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Butte to 12 miles north of Rose, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... O`neill, Spencer, O`Neill, Atkinson, Stuart, Butte, Lynch, Newport, Naper, Gross, Amelia, Bristow, Emmet, Dustin, Anoka, Monowi, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Opportunity and Midway. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 160 and 172. Highway 20 between mile markers 265 and 312. Highway 281 between mile markers 175 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 93 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
